items.title: Dr. A. Jameer Basha
items.description: Professor and Head of Computer Science and Engineering He completed his Ph.D. in Faculty of Information and Communication Engineering from Anna University and has been passionate about Information and Communication Engineering since his undergraduate years. Expertise: His research focuses mostly on machine learning, deep learning, and generative AI. His area of expertise is the classification and analysis of medical images. He presented her findings at national and international conferences and published many peer-reviewed pieces in prestigious journals. Research Interests: His current research projects include assessing the vulnerability of endangered species to climate change, modeling the distribution of invasive species in urban areas, and evaluating the effectiveness of community-based conservation.
items.qualification: Ph.D in Computer Science and Engineering
items.experience: 15+ years of teaching and research experience
items.achievements: Published 50+ research papers, Recipient of Best Teacher Award 2023

items.title: AI Enhanced IoT based Water Management System
items.students: AKSHAYA E (720821103009), KAMALESHWARI R (720821103046), KAVIN KUMAR P (720821103053), KAVIYASRI J (720821103054)
items.summary: An automated surveillance system designed to protect agricultural crops from animal intrusions using Real-time Object Detection (YOLOv8), IoT-based deterrents, and Cloud monitoring to ensure crop safety without manual guarding.

fullDetails.Justification: WP2 is relevant as the system utilizes data analysis and machine learning algorithms to process real-time data for drainage monitoring and decision-making. WP4 applies because the system integrates IoT and AI technologies, applying engineering principles for smart waste management solutions. WP6 aligns with the real-world application of IoT and AI for waste and drainage management, ensuring the system works effectively in urban environments.

items.title: Field Visit Tracker: Geo-Tagged Inspections with Digital Signatures
items.summary: The Field Visit Tracker is a digital system that modernizes inspections by officials, recording visits with geo-tagging, digital signatures, time, photos, and remarks, storing data in cloud dashboards for monitoring.

fullDetails.Justification: An AI-enabled mobile application allows officials to conduct geo-tagged inspections and submit digitally authenticated reports in a secure and efficient manner. Inspection data uploaded to secure cloud storage with dashboards for HOD and District Collectors monitoring. This system ensures genuine, auditable, tamper-proof reports with accurate location and time recording.

items.title: Single-Window Platform to Streamline Approvals and Empower Entrepreneurial Success
items.students: HARI HARAN S (720821103031), HARISH KEERTHI V (720821103036), HARISH S (720821103037), MAHALINGESHVARANATHAN N L (720821103062)
items.summary: A unified digital portal designed to streamline government approvals for entrepreneurs. It uses AI-driven automation and real-time tracking to simplify complex regulatory processes into a single-window experience.

fullDetails.Justification: WP4 applies as the system leverages engineering knowledge to design a comprehensive single-window platform that streamlines approval processes and enables efficient interaction between businesses and government agencies. WP6 aligns with the use of technology in creating an accessible and user-friendly platform that automates approvals and simplifies workflows.
